title: Colorado classique : a collection of fresh recipes from the Rockies
description: Colorado Classique Â features a collection of recipes from casual Apres Ski Beans to elegant Truffled Gnocchi. It also includes beautiful photography, a chapter on Colorado restaurants, and beer flavor profiles provided by Boulder Beer Company, Colorado's first microbrewery. You'll learn whether a pilsner or malt would be the perfect match for your meal, and if you prefer wine, you can try wine pairing suggestions from the Vineyard Wine Shop. Enjoy! The book is certified environmentally conscious by the Forest Stewardship Council.
author: Junior League of Denver
